data.text: @Pawlanegrete @ChemaliEric @LathamAbigail @2019thoughts They still made it about him when he shouldn't have been mentioned at all.
@Pawlanegrete @ChemaliEric @LathamAbigail @2019thoughts I can only hope that Justin will recover but in the state that Selena is in, they shouldn't have made it about him.

@Pawlanegrete @ChemaliEric @LathamAbigail @2019thoughts MY point is that Lupus is unpredictable. Selena IS at a high chance of dying at any moment. Like I've already said, Gomez has a severe form of Lupus and the effects are starting to show. Justin honestly wasn't the one who needed a hug that day. Selena and her family was.
@Pawlanegrete @jchristopherrrr @ChemaliEric @LathamAbigail @2019thoughts Thank you. I appreciate #prayers more than anything!

@jchristopherrrr @Pawlanegrete @ChemaliEric @LathamAbigail @2019thoughts I have #Lupus and it is a very difficult disease. It is sad at times because I see myself no longer being able to do certain things that I used to do w/ no problem. It's just the cards I've been dealt& I #keepfaith

@Pawlanegrete @ChemaliEric @LathamAbigail @2019thoughts If a person has lupus they are dying faster than everyone else. Selena is not fine because she has money to get help. She is literally staring death in the face.

@Pawlanegrete @ChemaliEric @LathamAbigail @2019thoughts My mom and grandma have it, I know my shit henny. Selena has a severe form of lupus, that's why her kidney failed. I'm not dragging Justin for crying, I wish only the best for him. I'm simply replying to you because you're putting out invalid information. Lupus IS a killer.

@Pawlanegrete @ChemaliEric @LathamAbigail @2019thoughts Girl you clearly don't know a lot about lupus. Lupus is an autoimmune disease that literally attacks your own organs. Last summer Selena's kidney shut down because of her disease and had to get a transplant. Lupus is currently killing whoever has it, including Selena.
@2019thoughts Selena deserves those wasted hugs and adoration.
@Pawlanegrete @2019thoughts No it was low. And how is her being hospitalised funny?
@Pawlanegrete @2019thoughts She had a low white blood cell count.
@Pawlanegrete @2019thoughts I'm more worried for Selena because she almost died.
@Pawlanegrete @2019thoughts Yes but Selena is the one who was hospitalised not him.
@2019thoughts Shut the fuck up, leave them alone
